rukus.text: 27|15|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban phdal chamnehdoeng da khpangkhpasa  aoy da vou d ning saou lai mean .  haey keat teangpir ban pol tha  real kar  sarsaer ku champoh a l laoh del ban leukatamkeung yeungokhnhom teangpir  chraen cheangke knongchamnaom khnhom robsa trong del mean chomnue .

27|19|pelnoh keat( saou lai mean) ban nhnhum daoy asasaamnaech  nung saamdei robsa me sramoch .  haey keat ban buongsuong som tha  ao mcheasa  robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda changaoulobangheanh khnhom  daembi aoy khnhom arkoun champoh  nie k meat robsa trong del ban bratan aoy khnhom  ning meateabeta robsakhnhom  ning daembi aoy khnhom sang ampeula del trong keab chetd  haey saum trong me tda  banhchoul khnhom tow knongchamnaom banda khnhom robsa trong del la troemotrauv daoy  kdei me tda krounea robsa trong phng choh .
